name: Bug Bear Attack!
description:
Tactical Microscopic Action!

This is a Top-Down shooter in a microscopic world. Observe a Tardigrade dubbed "Bug Bear" in its natural habitat. It will will be faced with several waves of enemies, obstacles, and collectibles like food or power ups. As the game begins, its health will constantly diminish so the player will need to consume as many “food” objects as possible to replenish that health in order to live longer. In addition to the health decrease, it will also be faced with hordes of enemies. They must either avoid or destroy them by shooting their own projectiles, receiving points for doing so.

Get through the first 3 levels to learn the basics, then go all out in the endless level 4.
